"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549766146368722930ca0200#post_549766146368722930ca0200
Stand Name: Jet Set Radio

Stand Ability:  Territory Paint. Any area marked by this Stands paint is considered it's territory. In the stands territory it's speed, strength, durability, and range all increase ten-fold. However using too much paint quickly dehydrates the user.
